name: FFAR Mk1 HE
description:
The Mk 4 Folding-Fin Aerial Rocket (FFAR), also known as Mighty Mouse, was an unguided rocket used by United States military aircraft.

It was designed as an air-to-air weapon for interceptor aircraft to shoot down enemy bombers, but primarily saw service as an air-to-surface weapon.

The FFAR has been developed into the modern Hydra 70 series, which is still in service.

Mk1 has a High Explosive warhead.
